nodes.text: Ultimate Sticker Collection: LEGO Star Wars: Mighty Minifigures
Ultimate Sticker Collection: LEGO Star Wars: Mighty Minifigures is a sticker book from the LEGO Star Wars series. It was released on April 7, 2015.

Join the minifigures in the epic battle between good and evil that dominates the LEGO Star Wars galaxy. Engage in the fight between Jedi and Sith, Republic and Separatists, Ewoks and stormtroopers. Ultimate Sticker Collection: LEGO® Star Wars®: Mighty Minifigures is packed with the latest 2015 LEGO Star Wars sets and minifigures.
LEGO, the LEGO logo, the Brick and Knob configurations and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group.
©2015 The LEGO Group. Produced by DK Publishing under license from the LEGO Group.
